metadata.rawFilterList:
! Checksum: xVezt93SeQAjgY+IMpqq4A
! Title: Persian Blocker
! Description: Filter list for blocking ads and trackers on websites in Persian.
! Version: 2.0.5.59
! TimeUpdated: 2025-07-28T04:45:58+00:00
! Expires: 10 days (update frequency)
!
! Title: ☀️ PersianBlockerNG ☀️
! Last modified: %timestamp%
! Expires: 5 days
! Description: Filters to block ads, trackers and annoyances in Persian websites
! License: https://codeberg.org/KhodeKiaa/PersianBlocker/src/branch/main/LICENSE
! Homepage: https://codeberg.org/KhodeKiaa/PersianBlocker
!
! GitHub issues: https://codeberg.org/KhodeKiaa/PersianBlocker/issues
! GitHub pull requests: https://codeberg.org/KhodeKiaa/PersianBlocker/pulls
! Ads:
! Title: PersianBlockerAds
! Last modified: %timestamp%
! Expires: 5 days
! Description: Filters to block ads in Persian websites
! License: https://codeberg.org/KhodeKiaa/PersianBlocker/src/branch/main/LICENSE
! Homepage: https://codeberg.org/KhodeKiaa/PersianBlocker
!
! GitHub issues: https://codeberg.org/KhodeKiaa/PersianBlocker/issues
! GitHub pull requests: https://codeberg.org/KhodeKiaa/PersianBlocker/pulls
! General !
! ==VVV== !
||adexo.ir^
! (e.g. sharghdaily.com):
||adexofiles.ir^
||adverge.ir^
||yektanet.com^
||mediaad.org^
||popupdl.ir^
||kaprila.com^
||sabavision.com^
||chavosh.org^
||adtrace.io^
! (e.g. sharghdaily.com):
||ads.karzar.net^
! pelikan.media (e.g. sharghdaily.com):
||pelikan-network.ir^
! blogfa.com (e.g. daylight.blogfa.com):
||blogfa.com/a^$script
||tavoos.net^
! namayesh.com, film.tebyan.net:
@@||player.tavoos.net/jwplayer.js^$script
@@||cdn.tavoos.net/services/smoothie/loader-mobile.js^$script
@@||cdn.tavoos.net/services/sticky/loader.min.js^$script
@@||cdn.tavoos.net/assets^$image,font
@@||tavoos.net/tavoos_contents^$image
@@||player.tavoos.net/tavoos-player.css^$stylesheet
@@||player.tavoos.net/jwplayer.core.controls.js^$script
@@||player.tavoos.net/jwplayer.core.controls.html5.js
@@||player.tavoos.net/provider.hlsjs.js^$script
@@||player.tavoos.net/assets^$image,font
! Specific !
! ===VV=== !
! abadis.ir
||abadis.ir/libs/async/ads.min.js^
abadis.ir##x
! dlfox.com
||dlfox.com/wp-content/uploads/*.gif^
||isarclinic.com^$image,domain=dlfox.com
||cdkeyshare.ir^$image,domain=dlfox.com
dlfox.com##.textwidget > a[href="www.dlfox.com"]:has(> img[alt="dlfox"])
dlfox.com##.ads_area_small_banner p:has(> a[target="_blank"] > img[alt])
dlfox.com##.home_mid_ads
dlfox.com##.ADS_wrapper
dlfox.com##.single_post_banner
dlfox.com##.banner_small_dlbox_b
! download.ir
||download.ir/wp-content/uploads/*.gif^
! zoomit.ir
! Header Ads:
zoomit.ir##div[class^="__className"]> div[class] > div[class]:has(> div[rowcount="1"][columncount="1"] > div[class] > a[target="_blank"][rel="sponsored"])
! Sidebar Ads:
zoomit.ir##div[class][flexdirection="column"][gap][flexwrap][justifycontent="flex-end"] > div[class][spacing]:has(> div[class][rowcount][columncount] > div[class] > a[target="_blank"][rel="sponsored"])
! In-post Ads:
zoomit.ir##div[class][flexdirection][gap][flexwrap][justifycontent]:has(> div[class][spacing] > div[class][rowcount="1"][columncount] > div[class] > a[target="_blank"][style][href^="https://b2n.ir/"] > img[alt][data-code][loading="lazy"][decoding="async"][data-nimg][style])
! mali3.com
||mali3.com/wp-content/uploads/*.gif^
mali3.com##.sidebar-area:has(> a[href] > img[width="330"][height="150"][alt=""])
mali3.com##.code-block:has(> a[target="_blank"][rel] > img[alt][width="800"][height="100"])
! web.rubika.ir
web.rubika.ir##rb-chat-ads-container
! web.eitaa.com
web.eitaa.com##.ads-active
! web.shad.ir
web.shad.ir##rb-chat-ads-container
! aparat.com
||dsp.aparat.com^
! nazriyab.app
nazriyab.app##.header-ex
! sheypoor.com
sheypoor.com##button[data-test-id^="link-to-https://www.sheypoor.com/banner/"]
! telewebion.com
||adengine.telewebion.com^
! digikala.com
! Ads in search results:
www.digikala.com#$#article > .items-center .mr-auto > .mr-1 > svg[style$="fill: var(--color-ad);"] .text-neutral-500::after { content: ' 🚫 (تبلیغ) 🚫 ' !important; color: red !important; font-weight: bold !important;  font-size: large !important; }
! Ads in https://www.digikala.com/incredible-offers/ results:
www.digikala.com#$?#div[class^="product-list_ProductList__item__"][data-product-index] > .block > .h-full[data-testid="product-card"] > article > .items-center:has(> .ml-1 > img[src="/statics/img/svg/productCard/topBadge/PromotedIncredibleOffer.svg"])::after { content: ' 🚫 (تبلیغ) 🚫 ' !important; color: red !important; font-weight: bold !important; }
! jobinja.ir
jobinja.ir#$#body { cursor: unset !important; }
jobinja.ir##.c-forceToLogin__overlay
jobinja.ir##.c-forceToLogin__message
jobinja.ir#$#.c-forceToLogin__content { filter: none !important; -webkit-filter: none !important; opacity:1 !important; }
! divar.ir
||api.divar.ir/v8/ad-auction^
||a-banners.divarcdn.com/ssp/ads^
divar.ir##.kt-inset-banner
! farsroid.com
farsroid.com##.site-top-nav > .grid-row > li > a[rel="dofollow"][target="_blank"]
farsroid.com##.farsroid-ads
farsroid.com##.single-text-ads
farsroid.com##.labeled-dw-ads
farsroid.com##.ads-download
farsroid.com##.ads-dashed-banner
! alef.ir
alef.ir##a[href="https://www.yektanet.com/"][target="_blank"]
alef.ir##a[href="https://panel.triboon.net/"][target="_blank"]
! virgool.io
||virgool.io/api2/app/posts/*/ad^
! setare.com
setare.com##.chavosh-ad-box
! beytoote.com
||adsc.beytoote.com^
||storage.beytoote.com/images/adsbeytoote^
beytoote.com##.countclick
beytoote.com##div[class*="pcfadv"]
! tgju.org
||static.tgju.org/advertisement^
tgju.org##.bottom-right-ad
! ninisite.com
ninisite.com###forum-native-ad
! tabnak.ir
||cdn.tabnak.ir/files/fa/adv^
! footballitarin.com
! https://github.com/MasterKia/PersianBlocker/issues/307
||blogger.googleusercontent.com/img^$domain=footballitarin.com
||footballitarin.com/agahi^
! aparat.com
! https://github.com/MasterKia/PersianBlocker/issues/304#issuecomment-3044430691
! Under the video:
aparat.com##.banner-ads
! In the corner:
aparat.com##.promote-puls
! sharghdaily.com
||cdn.sharghdaily.com/servev2^
! soft98.ir
! https://github.com/uBlockOrigin/uAssets/issues/14480
! https://github.com/MasterKia/PersianBlocker/issues/40
soft98.ir,~forum.soft98.ir#%#//scriptlet('ubo-aost.js', 'NodeList.prototype.forEach', '/\bRi[@\s][^\t]+\/application\.min\.packed\.js/')
soft98.ir,~forum.soft98.ir###abddh > *, div:has(> header + div > [data-href="https://cdn.hostdl.com/goto/soft98"]), section:has(> header + div > div > div > a[href*="utm_"]), [data-href^="https://padvish.com/"]

aparat.com#%#//scriptlet('ubo-set-session-storage-item.js', 'videoWatchCount', '$remove$')

! Video Censorship:
! Title: PersianBlockerCensor
! Last modified: %timestamp%
! Expires: 7 days
! Description: Filters to block video censorship in Persian websites
! License: https://codeberg.org/KhodeKiaa/PersianBlocker/src/branch/main/LICENSE
! Homepage: https://codeberg.org/KhodeKiaa/PersianBlocker
!
! GitHub issues: https://codeberg.org/KhodeKiaa/PersianBlocker/issues

! General !
! ==VVV== !
! Specific !
! ===VV=== !
! doostihaa.com: "نسخه اول دوبله فارسی سانسور شده"
! zardfilm.in: "تابع قوانین و مقررات"
! cooldl.net: upera.tv download links
! soft98.ir: Hostile behavior against users with content blockers
! google.com
www.google.com#$#a[href]:where([href*="doostihaa.com/"], [href*="zardfilm.in/"], [href*="cooldl.net/"], [href*="dlrozaneh.ir/"]) > h3::after { content: ' 🔞 (سانسور شده) 🔞 ' !important; color: red !important; font-weight: bold !important; }
www.google.com#$#a[href]:where([href*="soft98.ir/"]) > h3::after { content: ' ⚠️ ضد کاربر | Anti-User ⚠️ ' !important; color: red !important; font-weight: bold !important; }
! bing.com
www.bing.com#$#a[href][href*="&mediaurl="][target="_blank"][title][href^="/images/search?view=detail"]:where([href*="doostihaa.com/"], [href*="zardfilm.in/"], [href*="cooldl.net/"], [href*="dlrozaneh.ir/"])::before { content: ' 🔞 (سانسور شده) 🔞 ' !important; color: red !important; font-weight: bold !important; font-size: large !important; }
www.bing.com#$#a[href][href*="&mediaurl="][target="_blank"][title][href^="/images/search?view=detail"]:where([href*="soft98.ir/"])::before { content: ' ⚠️ ضد کاربر | Anti-User ⚠️ ' !important; color: red !important; font-weight: bold !important; font-size: large !important; }
! duckduckgo.com
duckduckgo.com#$#a[href][data-testid="result-title-a"]:where([href*="doostihaa.com/"], [href*="zardfilm.in/"], [href*="cooldl.net/"], [href*="dlrozaneh.ir/"])::after { content: ' 🔞 (سانسور شده) 🔞 ' !important; color: red !important; font-weight: bold !important; }
duckduckgo.com#$#a[href][data-testid="result-title-a"]:where([href*="soft98.ir/"])::after { content: ' ⚠️ ضد کاربر | Anti-User ⚠️ ' !important; color: red !important; font-weight: bold !important; }
! search.brave.com
search.brave.com#$#a[href][class$="heading-serpresult"]:where([href*="doostihaa.com/"], [href*="zardfilm.in/"], [href*="cooldl.net/"], [href*="dlrozaneh.ir/"])::after { content: ' 🔞 (سانسور شده) 🔞 ' !important; color: red !important; font-weight: bold !important; }
search.brave.com#$#a[href][class$="heading-serpresult"]:where([href*="soft98.ir/"])::after { content: ' ⚠️ ضد کاربر | Anti-User ⚠️ ' !important; color: red !important; font-weight: bold !important; }
! zarebin.ir
zarebin.ir#$#a[href][class^="!text-link"]:where([href*="doostihaa.com/"], [href*="zardfilm.in/"], [href*="cooldl.net/"], [href*="dlrozaneh.ir/"])::after { content: ' 🔞 (سانسور شده) 🔞 ' !important; color: red !important; font-weight: bold !important; }
zarebin.ir#$#a[href][class^="!text-link"]:where([href*="soft98.ir/"])::after { content: ' ⚠️ ضد کاربر | Anti-User ⚠️ ' !important; color: red !important; font-weight: bold !important; }
